description: Stops a database activity stream that was started using the Amazon Web Services console, the start-activity-stream CLI command, or the StartActivityStream operation. For more information, see Monitoring Amazon Aurora with Database Activity Streams in the Amazon Aurora User Guide or Monitoring Amazon RDS with Database Activity Streams in the Amazon RDS User Guide.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the DB cluster for the database activity stream. For example, arn:aws:rds:us-east-1:12345667890:cluster:das-cluster.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services KMS key identifier used for encrypting messages in the database activity stream.

nested_items.name: KinesisStreamName
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon Kinesis data stream used for the database activity stream.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the database activity stream.
